means.word_mean: 1. belief in Ras Tafari (Haile Selassie) as the Messiah and that Africa (especially Ethiopia) is the promised land

auth_sentence.content: Once regarded as a revolutionary threat, Rastafarianism became a cultural force, reflected in art and music.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once regarded as a revolutionary threat, Rastafarianism became a cultural force, reflected in art and music.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once regarded as a revolutionary threat, Rastafarianism became a cultural force, reflected in art and music.

auth_sentence.content: The reverence shown to Haile Selassie underlines the importance and inspiration of Ethiopia in the development of Rastafarianism.
auth_sentence.res_content: The reverence shown to Haile Selassie underlines the importance and inspiration of Ethiopia in the development of Rastafarianism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The reverence shown to Haile Selassie underlines the importance and inspiration of Ethiopia in the development of Rastafarianism.
